name: Sugati Travel CRM
slogan: One stop CRM solution for  bespoke travel companies
description: CRM for the travel industry built on the salesforce platform a one stop solution for travel solutions.

jobs.title: Salesforce developer
jobs.description:
As a member of the Project Delivery Team, you will report directly to the Head of delivery and will play a key part in ensuring that all CRM and App solutions are delivered to client expectations and meet Appssential’s high standards. You will provide a pivotal link between the Project Management Team and Quality Assurance Team, ensuring quality standards are met and the solution delivers on the project brief, prior to client delivery.

You will become part of the outstanding Development Team to understand the brief, assisting the Project Manager in raising concerns and things to be aware of when writing the design specifications, before working closely with the quality assurance team to thoroughly test the solution. The main focus of the role will be on quality Development. However, you will be involved throughout all stages of the project.

As a valued member of Appssential you will also have the opportunity to participate in new product development and will be encouraged to actively contribute towards improving our services and products to ensure we meet our ambitious growth plans. It is important that you have the right attitude, are willing to work hard and have a good career progression in Appssential. You must not have any freelance association once fully employed by Appssential. Appssential expects you to progress with the company and we will provide training (including Salesforce Certifications) and support to assist in your personal development.

4+ years experience using Salesforce.com
Dev 401 / Platform App Builder certification
Excellent javascript skills
Experience with AngularJS is desirable
Experience building Lightning Components is good to have
Proven track record of working within a professional effective team
Ideally successfully completed a Bachelor’s degree
Platform 1 or Platform 2 Certification is good to have
Sales Consultant and Service Cloud Consultants is nice to have
